rows.label: qst002208_msg0001
rows.name: We...we lost...?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0003
rows.name:
What am I going to do now...?
I...I have to join the Choir, or I can't...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0004
rows.name:
I can't take any more of this life!
If it weren't for you, I... I...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0005
rows.name:
Albina... I don't know what kind of
hardships you've been through.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0006
rows.name:
But I don't think it's right to join the
Choir in search of an easy life.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0007
rows.name:
Do you think the Pope would
want people to sing at his sacred
ceremonies for a reason like that?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0008
rows.name:
What are you saying...?
I'm the one in the wrong here...?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, I get it. You think I'm just not
good enough to make it in the Choir.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0010
rows.name: Yes...that is what I think.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0011
rows.name:
Just because you got lucky...
You've got some nerve...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0012
rows.name:
I...I'm not trying to boast about
my own skills! I just think...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0013
rows.name:
Go on. Say it.
Convince me, if you think you can.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0014
rows.name:
I...I don't think the Choir of Acedia
exists just to provide wealth to its
own members!

rows.label: qst002208_msg0015
rows.name:
I think the Choir exists to enrich the
hearts of everyone who hears it, its
own members included!

rows.label: qst002208_msg0016
rows.name:
To join the Choir, you need to be able
to wish for the happiness of others,
and turn those feelings into song!

rows.label: qst002208_msg0017
rows.name:
Those feelings are why the songs of
the Choir resonate with the people!

rows.label: qst002208_msg0018
rows.name:
You can't bring happiness to anyone by
singing while thinking only of yourself!

rows.label: qst002208_msg0019
rows.name:
That's why, um...I don't think...
Oh, I don't know how to say this...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0020
rows.name:
...Well, how am I meant to
argue with a speech like that?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0021
rows.name:
Dammit, Mellica.
I'm...sorry.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0022
rows.name:
N-no, I...I'm the one who should be
sorry... It really wasn't my place to
say all that...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0023
rows.name:
You know the stupid thing?
I love singing too. I really do.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0024
rows.name:
So I guess...I'll try again.
I'll sing for them again, and this
time I'll get through to them.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0025
rows.name:
Maybe that way I can get the best
of both worlds. A happy life...and
a happy heart.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0026
rows.name:
You just wait, though.
One day, I'll make everyone see
that I'm a better singer than you!

rows.label: qst002208_msg0027
rows.name:
Haha... I guess I should look
forward to that, then...?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0028
rows.name:
Thank you so much for all your
help, everyone.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0029
rows.name:
It was a lot scarier than I ever could
have thought, but I'm glad I managed
to make up with Albina in the end.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0030
rows.name:
This is for you, as thanks.
I hope you'll come and listen
to us sing sometime.
